thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com | 17 of 236
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text: I was very impressed with ability to communicate with staff before purchase to ensure that I ordered the correct plant (grape vines) for my purpose but was really surprised at the detailed support I received...not only with the proper plants and planting but input for the structure I was using to support them. This input was invaluable to me. I have planted and am anxiously waiting for spring. My confidence is high due to the support I received from the staff at this company. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
